featured.text: It is free from any bitter flavor.
It must be free from impurity, while exhibiting some fruitiness and creating a pleasant bitter flavor along with a peppery sensation in the mouth.

definition.zh_def: 苦的，帶有強烈不愉快味道的。
definition.en_def: Having a sharp, pungent taste or smell; not sweet.
definition.example: The coffee was too bitter for my liking.
